scripts.buildLadbrokesMobile: npm run preBuildLadbrokesMobile --env.brand=ladbrokes --env.platform=mobile && npm run ng-high-memory build ladbrokesMobile -- --configuration production --subresource-integrity=true && npm run postBuild
scripts.buildLadbrokesDesktop: npm run preBuildLadbrokesDesktop --env.brand=ladbrokes --env.platform=desktop && npm run ng-high-memory build ladbrokesDesktop -- --configuration production --subresource-integrity=true && npm run postBuild
scripts.buildCoralMobile: npm run preBuildCoralMobile --env.brand=coral && npm run ng-high-memory build vanillaMobile --configuration production --subresource-integrity=true
scripts.buildCoralDesktop: npm run preBuildCoralDesktop --env.brand=coral --env.platform=desktop && npm run ng-high-memory build vanillaDesktop -- --configuration production --subresource-integrity=true
scripts.generate-svg-ladbrokes-homepage: echo "Backward compatibility - no more SVGs. Remove after releasing BMA-43908" && exit 0
